p: The literally breathtaking pace of the COVID-19 pandemic is reflected in the lack of a unified public health responses to curb transmission. However, recommendations have coalesced on the use of isolation facemasks (eg, “surgical masks”) for HCWs in the clinical workspace. After an article in The New Yorker on March 21, 2020 by Dr. Atul Gawande [ 41] encouraging this protective measure for HCWs in the United States based on experiences from Singapore and Hong Kong, the Boston hospitals mandated this measure for HCWs on March 22, 2020 [ 42], followed by hospitals around the country in quick succession. Universal cloth face masking for the public was recommended by the CDC on April 3, 2020, but it has been actively debated in the White House [ 43].
